name: O1-OPEN/OpenO1-SFT
description: The O1-OPEN/OpenO1-SFT dataset is a groundbreaking collection of data that aims to revolutionize the way language models approach complex reasoning tasks. By employing SFT for Chain-of-Thought Activation, this dataset allows models to generate coherent and logical reasoning sequences, improving their ability to provide detailed and structured responses. With over 77,000 records, this dataset offers a wealth of data for researchers and developers to fine-tune their models and push the boundaries of AI capabilities in the realm of complex reasoning.
citeAs: @misc{O1OPEN_OpenO1-SFT,   title={O1-OPEN/OpenO1-SFT: A Dataset for Fine-tuning Language Models using SFT for Chain-of-Thought Activation},   author={O1-OPEN},    year={2024},   url={https://huggingface.co/datasets/O1-OPEN/OpenO1-SFT}, }
creator: O1-OPEN
keywords: Chain-of-Thought Activation, SFT Data, Language Model Fine-tuning
